name: Erdosnumberzero
body:
I'm a software engineer working on image processing applications on the [Kalray](kalrayinc.com) many-core processor. I primarily code in C POSIX, but have also done projects in OpenCL and using the Kalray Dataflow programming model.

I organise the [Paris Maker Girls meetup](http://www.meetup.com/Maker-Girls-Meetup/), which focuses on creating a community of women and girls interested in the Maker Movement. I organise workshops on electronics, Arduino projects, and soft circuits.

I studied Electrical Engineering at [UNSW](https://www.unsw.edu.au), specialising in image and signal processing.

In my free time, I like to sketch, watch arthouse films, travel, and hang out with my dog Pipotch.
Check out my work on [Github](github.com/erdosnumberzero) (transfer in progress!) or follow me on [Twitter](twitter.com/maker_girl).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
